col.name: body_subsite
description: Subsite of body site of acquisition.

col.name: antibiotics_family
description: Family of antibiotics currently used; Semicolon-separated.

col.name: study_condition
description: The main disease or condition under study; control for controls;STEC=Shiga-toxigenic E.coli;CDI=Clostridium difficile infection;IBD=Inflammatory bowel disease;T2D= Type-2 diabetes;T1D=Type-1 diabetes;AD=Atopic dermatitis;AR=Allergic rhinitis;IGT=Impaired glucose tolerance;AS=Ankylosing spondylitis;RA=rheumatic arthritis;FMT=fecal microbiota transplantaion;SRP=Scaling and root planing;CMV=Cytomegalovirus;HBV_HDV_HEV= Hepatitis viruses;BD= Bechet-disease;ACVD= Artheriosclerotic Cardiovalscular Disease

col.name: disease
description: Semicolon-delimited vector of conditions; Use healthy only if subject is known to be healthy; CRC=colorectal cancer;CD=Crohn's disease; for other abbreviations see study_condition

col.name: disease_subtype
description: Disease subtype; CD=Chrohn's Disease;AS=Ankylosing spondylitis;NAFLD=nonalcoholic fatty liver disease;for other abbreviations see study_condition

col.name: infant_age
description: Infant age (days); should be used for infants < 2 years old.

col.name: age_category
description: Age category: newborn < 1 year; 1 <= child < 12; 12 <= schoolage < 19; 19 <= adult <= 65; senior > 65.

col.name: visit_number
description: Visit number for studies with repeated visits.

col.name: country
description: Country of acquisition using ISO3 code from http://www.fao.org/countryprofiles/iso3list/en/.

col.name: population
description: can describe the belonging to a specific population

col.name: travel_destination
description: travel destination using ISO3 code from http://www.fao.org/countryprofiles/iso3list/en/.

col.name: non_westernized
description: Subject belongs to a non-westernized community.

col.name: lifestyle
description: to describe the lifestyle of non-westernized people

col.name: sequencing_platform
description: This will be modified as new sequencing platforms are added to the database.

col.name: PMID
description: Identifier of the main publication in PubMed.

col.name: number_reads
description: Number of final reads - calculated from raw data.

col.name: number_bases
description: Total number of bases sequenced in the sample - calculated from raw data.

col.name: minimum_read_length
description: Minimum read length - calculated from raw data.

col.name: median_read_length
description: Median read length - calculated from raw data.

col.name: birth_control_pil
description: Use of the birth-control-pils at the sampling time (men: no).

col.name: alcohol
description: Subject is reported as a drinker.

col.name: alcohol_numeric
description: Alcohol consumption reported as a float.

col.name: mumps
description: Subject has been through mumps in life.

col.name: days_after_onset
description: Days from the onset of the disease.

col.name: shigatoxin_2_elisa
description: Enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay for Shiga-toxigenic E.coli.

col.name: stool_texture
description: Texture of the stool at sampling time.

col.name: protein_intake
description: Indication about the protein intake in the Mongolians diet.

col.name: momeducat
description: Years of education of the mother of the subject.

col.name: hitchip_probe_class
description: High/Low species content onthe HIT-chip probe.

col.name: start_solidfood
description: First day of solid food introduction (newborns).

col.name: ALT
description: The Alanine aminotransferase test. STD. results of the test are allowed.

col.name: eGFR
description: The Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate. STD. estimate of the test allowed.

col.name: albumine
description: Albumine level; curators must use g/l.

col.name: hscrp
description: High-sensitivity C-reactive protein test result;curator have to use mg/L

col.name: family
description: A number identifying the family subjects belong; not corrected for meta-analyses.

col.name: family_role
description: Role in the family when multiple samples come from the same family but different persons.

col.name: birth_order
description: Can be used for multiple birth.

col.name: age_twins_started_to_live_apart
description: Age at which twins started to live apart (years).

col.name: formula_first_day
description: the age infants get the first formula feeding in days

col.name: HLA
description: HLA DR-DQ alleles conferring risk of Typ-1-Diabetes (T1D)

col.name: age_T1D_diagnosis
description: Age at which T1D was diagnosed (days).

col.name: disease_stage
description: Stage information for diseases that can be divided into multiple stages.

col.name: disease_location
description: Can be used for diseases which occur on different body parts like CD.

col.name: calprotectin
description: Higher calprotectin is an indicator for inflammation in the gastrointestinal tract.

col.name: treatment
description: medications or treatments against the diseases.

col.name: anti_PD_1
description: The patient results to be a responder/non-responder to the anti-PD1 treatment.

col.name: wbc
description: White blood cells count; curators must use *1000counts/µL

col.name: rbc
description: Red blood cells count; curators must use *million_counts/µL

col.name: hemoglobinometry
description: Hemoglobin concentration in blood; curators must use g/dl

col.name: ast
description: Aspartate transaminase; curator must use U/l

col.name: alt
description: Alanine aminotransferase; curator must use U/l

col.name: ASO
description: Antistreptolysin O; curator must use IU/ml

col.name: history_of_periodontitis
description: If the patients has been reported having previously suffered of periodontitis in one of more sites.

col.name: PPD_M
description: Depth of the pocket reached by the probe in a dental implant ('M').

col.name: PPD_B
description: Depth of the pocket reached by the probe in a dental implant ('B').

col.name: PPD_D
description: Depth of the pocket reached by the probe in a dental implant ('D').

col.name: PPD_L
description: Depth of the pocket reached by the probe in a dental implant ('L').

col.name: BASDAI
description: Bath Ankylosing Spondylitis Disease Activity Index

col.name: HBI
description: Harvey-Bradshaw Index clinical indication of active disease and inflammation

col.name: gestational_age
description: duration time of pregnancy;curatos must use weeks

col.name: uncurated_metadata
description: A row for whatever field has not be included here.
